title: Imaginary Friend

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If this role would roll, the player who would roll it gets a new role and a willing spectator is secretly added to the game as a hidden player with this role that's still a spectator. The player never sees that they would've gotten this role.
- You don't count towards majority, you aren't ever publicly displayed as a player, you can't whisper or vote, and you aren't a legal target for abilities or game actions.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Set a player's imagination free each night. As you use this ability, you may choose at least five roles with the same alignment and subalignment as your target. If you do, your target will be converted to one of those roles at random.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Help players you convert have more fun!
